content:
# Factorio Factory Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Operations
#### Coal Mining Operation at Position(16.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 0.0) - currently working with coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at position(17.5, -0.5) for coal storage with 234 coal
- Burner inserter at position(18.5, -0.5) with LEFT orientation that takes items from outside and puts them into the chest
- Burner inserter at position(17.5, 0.5) with DOWN orientation that takes coal from the chest but has output blocked with no destination

#### Coal Mining Operation at Position(16.0, 3.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 3.0) - currently working with coal as fuel
- Wooden chest at position(17.5, 2.5) for coal storage with 264 coal

### Power Generation System (Partially Working)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump at position(-9.5, 1.5) producing water, now connected to the boiler
- Boiler at position(-8.0, 3.5) with RIGHT orientation - connected to water but needs fuel
- Steam engine at position(-4.5, 5.5) with RIGHT orientation - connected to boiler with pipes and underground pipes
- Small electric poles connecting the steam engine to assembling machines
- Various pipes connecting the system components
- The system is now producing electricity with the steam engine showing as working

### Iron Mining and Smelting
#### Iron Mining at Position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(16.0, 71.0) mining iron ore - currently working with coal as fuel
- Stone furnace at position(16.0, 74.0) with 20 coal as fuel but no ingredients to smelt
- Wooden chest at position(16.5, 72.5) for iron ore storage with 423 iron ore
- Wooden chest at position(16.5, 76.5) for iron plate storage

#### Iron Smelting at Position(50.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(50.0, 0.0) with coal as fuel, currently smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Burner inserter at position(48.5, 0.5) with RIGHT orientation for feeding iron ore to the furnace
- Burner inserter at position(52.5, 0.5) with RIGHT orientation for removing iron plates from the furnace

### Steel Smelting at Position(60.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(60.0, 0.0) with 13 coal as fuel, currently not smelting with 7 iron plates inside

### Copper Mining and Smelting
#### Copper Mining at Position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-46.0, 71.0) mining copper ore - currently working with coal as fuel but chest is full
- Stone furnace at position(-46.0, 74.0) with 20 coal as fuel but no ingredients to smelt
- Wooden chest at position(-45.5, 72.5) for copper ore storage with 544 copper ore
- Burner inserter at position(-45.5, 75.5) that moves processed copper from furnace
- Wooden chest at position(-45.5, 76.5) for copper plate storage

#### Copper Smelting at Position(50.0, 5.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(50.0, 5.0) with 20 coal as fuel, currently not smelting with 38 copper plates produced

### Stone Processing at Position(30.0, 50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace at position(30.0, 50.0) with 9 coal as fuel, currently smelting stone into stone bricks
- Wooden chest at position(30.5, 48.5) for stone storage
- Wooden chest at position(30.5, 52
